en.meta-description: Set up Two-Factor Authentication for your BitMinded account
en.2fa-subtitle: Secure your account with an extra layer of protection
en.2fa-step1-description: Two-Factor Authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. You'll need both your password and a code from your authenticator app to sign in.
en.2fa-step2-step1: Install an authenticator app like Google Authenticator, Authy, or Microsoft Authenticator
en.2fa-step2-step2: Scan the QR code below with your app
en.2fa-step2-step3: Enter the 6-digit code from your app to verify
en.2fa-secret-explanation: If you can't scan the QR code, you can manually enter this secret key into your authenticator app:
en.2fa-step1-description: Two-Factor Authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. You'll need both your password and a code from your authenticator app to sign in.
en.2fa-step2-step1: Install an authenticator app like Google Authenticator, Authy, or Microsoft Authenticator
en.2fa-step2-step2: Scan the QR code below with your app
en.2fa-step2-step3: Enter the 6-digit code from your app to verify
en.2fa-step3-description: Save these backup codes in a safe place. You can use them to access your account if you lose your authenticator device.
